website_summaries.verdict: Classic looks with a great amount of comfort and padding.
pros: Stands out for its pub height, which provides a true bar-like experience for anyone sitting on the stool
Swivel glides smoothly around the full 360-degree arc
Perfect for home bar owners seeking a more traditional look
cons: Requires a table or bar with a standard pub height

customer_reviews.title: Color variation
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I'm in love with these chairs. However because i needed 5 chairs I started by ordering just one to ensure I liked them so I wouldn't have to pay to return. I LOVED my first chair so I placed the rest of my order. The new ones (4 of them) are a different color and don't match the original..... now what.....
customer_reviews.author: Acoult14

customer_reviews.title: Bar stools are heavy and look nice but apparently not made very well
customer_reviews.text: Bar stools are heavy and look nice but apparently not made very well. The bracing that holds the top swivel bracket came loose the first time that we sat in one of them. Rather than send it back I opted to fix it myself by putting bolts and nuts in place of the glue and screws that pulled loose on three of the four sides. I'm hoping the problem is fixed and doesn't happen to the other one.
customer_reviews.author: kjones9820

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I debated back and forth and looked at many different ines from many sites but I wanted something with backs for the kids and leather on the bottom to easily wipe spills but still had a rustic look for me! I couldn't be more pleased! They are sturdy, rustic, and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! They're exactly what my husband and I needed for our bar. Compared to the set of Boraam swivel barstools I got for our kitchen, these were a dream to put together. They each took about 20 minutes to put together because the swivel seat is already assembled. A power drill also made it very quick work :) One seat came with a tiny gash in the seat in the back in an unnoticeable spot, so Amazon issued me a small refund to keep it and I was able to glue it. Overall I had a great experience with these stools.
customer_reviews.author: raymey7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our small/narrow bar space. We got them because they fit our criteria: has a back, attractive, affordable. We purchased these for our grandkids to use and I am really surprised at how bottom heavy they are. Those crazy munchkins wont be knocking them over or tipping them over. I have attached photos to show how the color of the stools change depending on light. We are in the middle of a remodel and these match our new furniture beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Rustic & Modern
customer_reviews.text: True counter height. Low backs. Comfortable. They fit perfect at my kitchen Island/dining room table. Easy to put together. Quality bar stools. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After spending many hours assembling the bar stools the reasons for our dissatisfaction include the following: • Most of the six chairs either do not swivel or swivel it is with much difficulty. • Two of the legs required my husband to take them out to his workshop to shave down the sides of the legs in order for them to fit into the designated slot. • The legs of the chairs are not the same length causing the chair to wobble. • The stain color of the wooden backs are much darker than appeared on the website. (Plus one chair after only three days is already chipping.)
customer_reviews.author: Connie Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Color is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I only just received and assembled these today. I’m very disappointed in the color of these bar stools. After spending months deciding on the perfect chairs for our kitchen bar, I decided to get these. After assembling and placing in the kitchen, I noticed the color difference. I specifically purchased these because of their oak color that would match my cabinets. You can see in the picture a side by side of their advertised stool and the color I actually received. Hindsight I should have avoided assembling all 3, now I’m stuck with stools that do not match the way I expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: Better in person!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. The color has more gray tones than the manufacturer photo. I gave them 4 stars for two reasons, one- I’ve only had them a week and not sure how they’ll hold up over time, two- one out of three had a slightly shorter leg and wobbles a bit. I tried to adjust by tightening and loosening screws but it didn’t fix the wobble. They are wood and pretty heavy, comfortable too. These were much easier for me to put together than other chairs of assembled in the past. The directions say to put all screws in before tightening, this a good piece of advice!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Amazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Set of 2?
customer_reviews.text: Great stools. Look awesome at our kitchen island. One star review is for the seller. It clearly states that the order is for a set of 2. I ordered 2 sets (4 stools) and only received 2 stools. I will update my review after hearing from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: surface has splinters
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and the seats & backs are comfortable, sturdy, and heavy. One of the stools will not turn 36 degrees, one of the stools has splits where 2 tacks attach the cushions. I put super glue on to keep from further splitting. There is a composite overlay over all the wood and it has splinters on all the wooden surface. I got 2 splinters in my finger holding parts for assembly. I chose not to return them. I will have to paint with varnish to cover the splinters. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cash

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly process is about 10 mins per chair. But you will realized that the foot rest is flimsy and the day i purchased it i said that it was going to strip and after 3 months it sure did. 2 of the four bolts have stripped from 1 chair and 1 of 4 has strilped from the other. Other that that it was comfortable and look great. If the compant wouldn't mind sending me two more foot rings with screwws i would change my review to 5 stars. But wil will see.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy. We found one of the seats had a ...
customer_reviews.text: As what I expected. Delivery on time. My husband and I able to assemble these 3 counter stools without any frustrations. It was so easy. We found one of the seats had a small tear approx. half inch wide. It looks like the knife cut to it. At first, we thought to return it and contacted the distributor. They responded quite quick. I appreciated it. BUT due to many things happened around new house and other errands we had. We let it go, don't bother to return it. We have these counter stools for almost a month now. Everything seems okay. We happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Pair of Stools
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these barstools a couple of weeks ago. They are Great! Yes, they are relatively easy to assemble. You will probably need two people ( at least part of the time) to put these together. I Strongly recommend that you do not tighten all the bolts until they are all started to the adjoining parts. I did notice a couple of scuff marks on the seatbacks, nothing terrible though. I taped the Allen wrench to the bottom of each stool so that I don't lose them and if needed in the future to tighten the screws as needed. The 360 swivel is of course pretty neat. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Chifan7

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Recommendations: to make sure all pieces fit properly, secure the ring around the base of the legs first before securing the legs to the seat of the chair. Makes it so much easier. And to secure the backing- Screw the middle screw in first before you complete the left and right screws. Do this and it will take less than time than it took me to assemble. Other than that the seat itself is nice when assembled and so far it’s comfortable. Will have to do an update when more usage occurs.
customer_reviews.author: D Mackin

customer_reviews.title: Beware they came with termites!
customer_reviews.text: Three chairs were received on Friday and looked fine. All three now have holes everywhere! Going back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Azombie4ever

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these and the 3rd chair seat back would not align up to be mounted (not even close). The holes were not drilled correctly. I called Ashley and I am able to return the item for a replacement.... however I would have to take the chair apart and reassemble another chair. I asked if they could ship me an assembled chair and that is not an option (it is an option when you order the chair). Not the consumers fault that Ashley's QC did not QC this item. I feel rather then having to assemble, disassemble and then reassemble is a little excessive for something that is not the customers fault.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This bar stool is sturdier than I expected. It's actually a little heavy but not terribly so. It is reasonably comfortable. I wish the seat were just a little larger. But for occasional seating, it's fine. My only minor annoyance is after assembling two, the legs are not equal length, or mount such that the stool does not sit flat and wobbles. I added a felt pad on one and that helped, although I'd like to put a pad on all four legs, which will require me to probably sand one leg down. All in all, happy with my purchase. I may order a third.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Returned by another customer and sent to me
customer_reviews.text: Took 4 weeks to arrive. Clearly received a stool that was assembled and returned by another customer. Several missing pieces of hardware, missing half the instructions, missing bottom bumpers on two legs-making the stool uneven, could tell pieces had been screwed on and then removed by marks on the stool. Silica packets were open in box-spread all over my house-took several attempts to clean it all up to keep away from my dog. Ordered two stools and only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Made in China, some defects.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these a five star rating, except that I have one of them that the legs aren't even. It tips back and forth a bit on a level surface, and the holes for the back on one of the stools were very hard to line up like the back was bent a bit. Very sturdy, seems of good quality. The one stool with a little tip to it drives me crazy, I tired to loosen the bolts and even sit on it to even them out, but I think one of them is cut a little shorter. They are made in China, not a fan of that. I thought Ashley furniture was all US made.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Barstools are not cheap. These are probably the nicest I've seen for the money. I had to get four for our island. They do have a ton of packaging and take some time to assemble but worth it. One of the cushions is lumpy looking but you do not notice when sitting on it. For some reason the delivery went to USPS instead of UPS or FedEx so we had to pick them up from our local post office. Also, there are no feet under the legs and the wood legs will pick up sand and scratch wood floors. I grabbed some felt pads and installed them to help prevent further scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Back heavy
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of the stools and that I can wipe them clean! The horrible thing is that they keep tipping over! We have had at least five times that a child between 2-4 has fallen while sitting in these. They are WAY too back heavy. The swivel is also not the best. They get stuck as you try to swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected-Keep exploring options
customer_reviews.text: I expected better quality to these bar stools. The wood is too textured and not as smooth as I would like. I am not going to be able to sit at these stools with any stockings, nylon, or for that matter any fabric on that I care about and not worry that the wood won't snag the material. If it wasn't such as hassle, I would definitely return them. They look better online than in person. I'll deal with it until the cushion wears, which won't be long because it's a cheap padding.
customer_reviews.author: ScientificGal

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend to unbox these outside; the styrofoam makes a huge mess. I bought four of these, and each one had it’s own quality control problem... small scratches/gashes in the wood back part, sloppy wood stain job, one swivel function is really tight. May need some WD-40. Nothing horrible to make me send them back, but just annoying. Overall I am happy and I like the way they look. The cushion is very firm and the back part tilts more outward than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: MDM

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised by the quality of these counter stools! They seem heavy duty, durable, and of great quality. The back rest is contoured enough so that it’s comfortable to sit in. The seat has a decent amount of cushion as to not feel the wood frame. I looked at stools that were $300-$600 more and the didn’t seem as sturdy as these! I am very difficult to please, and I’ve have been pleased. I would highly recommend this counter stool for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for solid stools
customer_reviews.text: These are very atttactive, high quality bar stools; especially at their price. The wood, metal, and swivel mechanism all appear to be sturdy. They do lack foot pads, which are essential, and should be included. I will buy and install them, separately. Assembly tip: In step one, you bolt the legs to the frame. Do NOT fully tighten the bolts or else you will not be able to install the footrest ring. So attach them loosely, then install the foot rest ring. Now you can tighten the leg bolts fully.
customer_reviews.author: Hay Seed

customer_reviews.title: Great bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bar stools! I already spilled red wine on one and by some kind of voodoo magic, I was able to blot it out using just water and it did not stain. Assembly was pretty straight-forward and took 15-20 minutes per chair. Comes with everything you need except a regular screwdriver. Finished product seems to be quite sturdy; the seat and back are very comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good value and pretty easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with these barstools. They look really nice and we've gotten lots of compliments on them. The bar height stools are perfect for bar height countertops, they swivel well, and they are quite comfortable to sit on. Assembly was pretty easy, just takes time. The directions were easy to understand, but the labeling of the screws and bolts could've been MUCH better. It would save customers time during assembly if those pieces were more clearly labeled.
customer_reviews.author: willowjewel

customer_reviews.title: Tippy and poorly finished
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these but was disappointed with the rough and uneven finish. Maybe that would be ok if you're looking for a antique industrial look. However, one leg was 1/4 inch short so it wobbled and the legs are so close together it easily tips over. The swivel doesn't turn smoothly either. That said they are comfortable, solidly built, and easy to assemble. Returned them and got another brand - better in all respects except harder to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd_S

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking stool
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stool, very sturdy and the seat is comfy. It doesn’t twirl around very easily though. I needed it for my drawing table and needed to be able to rotate around to get materials. I also think the seat needs to be larger for leg comfort. Didn’t work for me so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Pub!
customer_reviews.text: These are stunning and match my bar perfectly. The seat swivels nicely and is a firm cushion which I hope will last. The frame is sturdy and it was relatively easy to put together. I spent more time taking it out of the box as it was packaged well. I was learly from purchasing on Amazon versus in a store, but due to Covid, had no other option. We purchased 5 stools based off pictures and reviews and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped they'd be!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these bar stools - they're really sturdy so I'm not concerned about them coming apart. I needed something rustic so the way they're finished met my expectations. I measured and went with the taller ones knowing I could cut them down in I needed. The others were just too short for our counter. I've been shopping for about a year now and am thrilled to find these. I was shopping online and when I found the lowest price I thought - let me check Amazon -- and of course they had it for the same low price PLUS not shopping with Prime and we got them in two days. Love them!!!! (Stools . . . and Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Gene Mc

customer_reviews.title: Does not last! Warning.....
customer_reviews.text: After just 2 years of use, these bar stools are unusable and even dangerous. The swivel seat repeatedly loosens with even light use. We re-tightened several times and after several times, the stools/screws "strip" out and can no longer be tightened. We tried putting additional screws in, but cannot tighten the stools at all. They are loose and unusable. Wish we had not bought, do not recommend. Will no longer buy this brand!
customer_reviews.author: PMcK

customer_reviews.title: Very solid set of kitchen counter stools
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was reasonably easy, just be sure to wait to tighten the legs until everything is together and then tighten them in a cross bolt manner like an automobile wheel (see your auto’s user manual on changing tires). The result appears to be extremely sturdy. Chairs are comfortable to sit in. Be sure to get the correct height stool. There are bar stools and counter stools. For a standard height kitchen peninsula counter you will want the counter stools.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Coryer

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted, but for price got to modify.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a box with no damage, outside printing said instructions included. I found none in package, thankfully it was self explanatory! My only complaint is for the money, which is worth it, it should have been balanced, so now I need to modify one leg to stop the wobble. So in perfect condition, well worth the cost, having to modify not so much. Only reason it did not get 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: fruitloops

customer_reviews.title: Looks great once put together
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have them set up, they look great. I initially thought the wood was damaged when I got it but realized that it was just the "distressed" look. I was apprhensive but once they were put together, they looked great. Also, a bit of advice when putting them together...don't tighten the seat screws until you get that ring somewhat secured and then tighten all of them. Learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: The back rest is actually comfortable and hugs your back instead of feeling like you ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these stools. The back rest is actually comfortable and hugs your back instead of feeling like you are leaned back. The cushioned seat is soft and comfortable as well! I will say that my husband had a little hard time with screwing in the back rest because it goes in sideways, but just be patient and it will be fine! The price was unmatched compared to other similar stools. some other reviews said that the stools are uneven but I found that if the stool is turned evenly with the leg in the front it does not wobble at all. Perfect foot rest as well
customer_reviews.author: JB222

customer_reviews.title: chair broke in two weeks and stopped swiveling-Amazon great with returns
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two chairs, and they are well made and really love them. Was disappointed when I called the manufacturer to discuss if we could repair the 2nd chair which stopped swiveling after 2-3 weeks of almost no use! They said they would call me back, after I talked to three people about the problem. They never called. I then returned it through Amazon with no trouble at all and I am awaiting the replacement chair. Thank you Amazon for the excellent stress free return customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Williams, MA, RVT, ACAAB

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. I ordered 3 brown
customer_reviews.text: If you are ordering one, I would recommend. I ordered 3 brown. Two were brown and were closely matched. The third was a gray/brown. Doesn't look good with the other two. Unfortunately, my husband put them together and threw away the boxes. When ordering brown, I expect brown. Not what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Well built perfect chairs
customer_reviews.text: I loved these chairs and bought 4. At this price and build quality, these are an absolute bargain! I know this because I saw them in 2 different stores for $195 and $164 per chair!! (the latter price applied for 8 chairs and above) I also assembled them myself with no professional help and it was a breeze! I shall remember this fantastic deal for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: cryptoman

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait - get them now!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at these and other chairs FOREVER, finally took the plunge. They are AWESOME! Love them, they are super sturdy, swivel nicely, but not so loose that they bang into your counter!! Perfect height and ohhhhhh so comfy! Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are such pretty stools! I got the counter height stools to accommodate the height of my island. They are pretty comfortable and sturdy so far. They were relatively easy to put together. The only negative is they leave white scuff marks on my hardwoods but its an easy fix with felt pads underneath! Overall I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first 2 came in 2 large boxes both boxes were in good shape. Opened the first box the back was destroyed and the seat base wasn't much better. Opened the second box just as bad. Asked to be replaced same as the first two scratched and looked awful. I ended up 2 out of the 4 and returning 2. The only reason I kept 2 was I needed something.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: is a great bar stool
customer_reviews.text: is a great bar stool! It goes great paired with theI love this set! The bar stool was extremely easy to put together and it is very durable! I was pleasantly surprised with the quality. The high back is extremely comfortable along with the cushion seat. I love the mix of metal and wood here, very stylish and an awesome bar stool!
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Abnet

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools. They match my kitchen perfectly. Easy enough for me to put together by myself except for having someone hold the ring up while I screwed it in. I bought 2 and one wobbles a little though. I put them together exactly the same so I’m not sure why that happened.Put one of those sticky cushion tabs on it and you can’t even tell. So I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Texasunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stools. Heavy but swivel makes them easier to handle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of these stools. Very neat design. Perfect countertop heighth. Heavy and sturdy. They are not that easy to put together. Takes time and patience. Be sure not to tighten leg bolts before putting on the leg ring and getting those bolts started. Thighten ring bolts first then go back and tighten leg bolts. For the back rest start center bolt first. Otherwise they will not line up to other bolt holes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with these chairs. Perfectly designed for everyday use and sturdy. The seat cushion is adequate and provides comfy seating. Installation took about 15min each. Only tighten the screws after all the screws are in. Otherwise the foot rest will not linger up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kene

customer_reviews.title: Nothing worse than being shorted hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Chairs looks nice and sturdy, but there is nothing worse than being shorted the necessary hardware to properly assemble. Missing two key bolts for safe assembly. The hardware package looked that it was tampered with, then neatly tucked back into the original sealed packaging; very sketch. I bought two chairs, and while one was shorted hardware, the other had just enough scrapes on the metal back that requires to go out and buy touch on metal paint. Send it back? These things are 50lbs each, and packed like a sardines. It's easier to run to the hardware store than take 3 hours to try and fit it back in a drop off to return center.
customer_reviews.author: Spanster

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about ordering furniture on line but these did NOT disappoint, specially for the price. Putting them together wasn't easy at least the first one, but the 3 after went together faster with a little experience. Once together looked just as good as the photos and maybe even better. High quality and attractive appearance. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie K. Graham

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are fantastic! This was quit the undertaking
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are fantastic! This was quit the undertaking, I wanted 8 chairs to go around my very large kitchen "island" area. 1 of 3 chairs would arrive damaged in one way or another. I could handle minor wood flaws, this would be repairable but the leather seat cushion being torn is not. The inspection process of the chairs prior to packaging them can certainly be improved!
customer_reviews.author: TMKK

customer_reviews.title: great swivel barstools!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools so much! I have an ikea island and I just did not like the chairs they paired with it. These barstools are great because they are compact and fit in the small space and they swivel so no fighting with your neighbor to get in. I also bought them because the back support is comfortable to me. You don't feel so upright like some of the other stools. My local store wanted an extra $80 for these, maybe because they did the assembly. You do have to assemble them but it's pretty easy. I would definitely buy more if I needed more. The leather is soft and nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy chair with a couple issues
customer_reviews.text: The chairs seem sturdy and comfortable. We have a few problems: The material on seat is coming loose under 2 nailheads and there is some chipping, unusual sanding on a few different spots on the back of the chair and area under the seat. Leveling is a bit of an issue; hopefully, adding some pads will fix the problem. The color is very antiqued.....more whitewash. Definitely not the color we saw on here. Not a great color for the area in which it will be used. After assembling, we are not as happy as we thought we would be.
customer_reviews.author: anniemarie

customer_reviews.title: High Quality For Low Price Point!
customer_reviews.text: They are very, very nice looking! The nailheads just pop on them. Finish is beautiful and material is quality. Very heavy chairs and feel super sturdy. They are somewhat compact; not a huge chair. Went together very easily, even for me doing it by myself. The cushion is firm. It may soften in time, but not soft and cushionie, but comfortable anyway. This chair can go industrial farmhouse or somewhat modern. Great stools!
customer_reviews.author: Raven’sCall

customer_reviews.title: Nice barstools but were sent two different ones.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving a bad review is because you all sent two different colored chairs at two different heights when I simply ordered 2 of the exact same chair. We didn't even notice any of this until 3 hours after putting them together and sitting back looking at them. This is quite irritating considering the fact. And I cannot return because boxes were thrown into the trash. How hard is it to seriously just complete an order properly?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie8787

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very nice and are a crowd pleaser. Everyone that walks in compliments the stools! I did have one of the stools lose a ball barring or something because the stool started spinning very hard, almost to the point of not spinning 360. I emailed Amazon and they swapped the stool out for a new one. The new stool came in 36 hours. Unbelievable customer service! The assembly isn't awful, but takes time to get all the nuts and bolts tightened. the pieces aren't light either so having a couple people assemble is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Stillson

customer_reviews.title: Like the looks
customer_reviews.text: Pub height bar stools went together easily. We lightly sanded all wooden parts, cleaned and spray stained the color of our kitchen cabinets with a satin finish. That’s the main reason for purchasing this particular model. They are really tight to swivel. Don’t know if it will loosen up or if we’ll have to do something. Like the looks though, and the seat is just the right diameter. Some models are too small and others take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: It’s just looks but really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable seats ever !! It just looks good I wish I didn’t buy all 3 and since my husband wanted to surprise me he built them and threw boxes away so I’m stuck with these uncomfortable stools. They should spend a little more on good padding
customer_reviews.author: Karyz

customer_reviews.title: These chairs look perfect in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look perfect in my kitchen. They do have a tendency to tip if you put weight on the front "bar" while getting off chair. Be careful around children. They are VERY heavy. It might be just my stools, but they really don't swivel unless you are sitting in them. Putting them together was a bit difficult. I didn't follow directions and went with some other suggestions and that was to put the legs on almost all way, then putting ring on, finding the holes for the ring to attach, finish tightening the legs to base, then tightening ring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Tip
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic and are well built and sturdy. My only tip is that when assembling, you just barely attach the legs to the seat first, and then attach the ring before tightening everything. I over-tightened the legs and then the ring wouldn't fit, so I had to start over. Also, the swivel isn't as smooth as I'd expected, but I plan to use some WD-40 or Ballistol on them to try and fix that. But they look amazing at my island counter, and are the perfect height and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These look so nice. They are very sturdy and very comfortable. We originally ordered 2 of these stools and a bench for the other side of the table. When the stools came, we quickly ordered more and returned the stool because my teens all said they'd fight over the stools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 bar stools. One came damaged, returned for another and it also came damaged. Customer service at amazon was very helpful and I had another replacement sent that was perfect. When assembling the first chair it went together without a problem, the 2nd chair had a leg that wouldn't fit into the space it was supposed to attach to. Had to sand the space to make the opening large enough for the leg to fit. Haven't assembled the 3rd chair yet. Chairs are very comfortable and sturdy. The back is supportive and hits at just the right spot to feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CFlaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Stool
customer_reviews.text: After many months of an unsuccessful search for counter stools to fit under our exceptionally long counter, I was so happy to find these Ashley Furniture stools. They are perfect! Very comfortable, easy to put together and classy. If you need counter stools and are not trying to match a modern decor, these will please you no end. Everyone who visits is quick to compliment them. Buy them - the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Even Better In Person.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these counter-height swivel chairs for my son's new condo. He is 25 and I don't believe had ever attempted to build any furniture before. The first one was giving him a little trouble with screw/hole alignment and a slight wobble. Discouraged, I even told him to box it back up and we would return them all (we ordered 3). He refused to give up and with a little loosening and repositioning, he got everything to align and he said the other two were perfect. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: One of Them Won't Spin
customer_reviews.text: These stools are super cute and are at a great price point. We bought them in both counter and bar height. Our only gripe is that (we have 2) when you sit on one of them it spins well, when you sit on the other one it takes a lot of effort to spin. That's annoying. No one wants the stool that doesn't spin, when you pay for a spinning feature.
customer_reviews.author: JDiMagg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 barstools for our dining island. The first one was easy to put together. No problems. The second one had a leg that was cracked, but thankfully Amazon has a super easy exchange system, and I was able to get a new one exchanged within the week. They turned out beautifully and are super comfortable and cushy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at these for quite a while, and then noticed you could buy the returned version for MUCH less! Got two chairs in excellent condition and original packaging for less than it would have cost me for one! Took 30 minutes to put together each chair tops. Watch the video...step by step and easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and appear to be quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I assembled a set of four i about an hour. They appear to be sturdy and comfortable for both children and adults including my 6 foot seven inch project manager. The leather or faux leather seat cushions are both easy to clean and is resistant to hard wear by children and some adult slob friends who are not careful about what they are wearing when they sit on a new piece of furniture. The residue from their dirty or stained pants easily wipes off of the seat cushions.
customer_reviews.author: anableps

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very nice and sturdy (heavy weight). I single handily put them together in roughly 30 minutes. I ran into one hiccup, which was, the wood for one of the legs on one stool was not cut right. I had to saw about a half inch of wood so that the leg would screw in. Other than that, I’m satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady B

customer_reviews.title: Durable construction
customer_reviews.text: Was so tired of our son and his friends breaking our barstools. These are durable. Interesting design. Wish they came in more colors, the wood on ours has a grey tint to it, so doesn't match our oak bar all that well. I'm willing to overlook that as the quality and value was right.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: Ashley stools are very nice and well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these we really like them, very comfortable to sit in the color is really nice too. We have prime so they shipped quick but one of them, had a small tare in the leather so we sent it right back, so if you order them check the leather, we were a little upset that Amazon doesn't ship another one right back out we did a replacement they waited 7 days to ship, so prime doesn't make a difference. Just a little FYI, but we are happy with the stools.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny's review

customer_reviews.title: Pleased overall; note 1 chair in 1 order
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a decent chair! Matches the description/picture. Was a little challenging to get everything to line up; was not overly difficult to fix the alignment. It arrived with a discoloration on the whitish fabric; will try to remove. Swivel action is not as smooth as I would prefer; will try something to lubricate. Will be ordering another as I intended to get a matched set. It may be more comfortable than rated since I just received and assembled it today.
customer_reviews.author: UsesAmazonoften

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy stools - but........
customer_reviews.text: The stools are beautiful and sturdy and match our kitchen perfectly. They came packaged very well and all parts were present - however, that’s why I was so confused and disappointed to see that every one of the six stools we ordered came with backs that were damaged. Not enough to be unusable, but each one had to be sanded a bit, then stained to match..... As mentioned, they were packaged very well so it appears they were already damaged when placed in the boxes - very poor quality control by a company that generally has very nice furniture.....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stools
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these stools and the price was right. They seem a little clunky in turning. The worst thing was that when we were assembling the stools our cat jumped on the stool (literally 1 minute) and put holes on the seat. NOT recommended for households with pets. I contacted Ashley and was dismissed by them.
customer_reviews.author: Big Easy Bud

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Have a table in kitchen that is counter height, the chairs that came with it had start to fall apart after a couple years so decided to try this barstool as a replacement for one of the chairs. It arrived in 2 days, and was extremely EASY to put together. Took me less than 10 minutes. And this is a sturdy barstool. Looks and feels great. My girlfriend and I liked it so much we are ordering 3 more. Absolutely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lucas

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful but ording is deceiving. There is a picture of two stools so I only ordered two thinking I would get four. I contacted amazon via chat, to tell them I ordered four chairs. They reprocessed another order, but I still only have three chairs now. This is false advertisement. The picture should only show one chair if that is all it includes. I now have to order another chair to complete the set and I am not happy about having to spend more money than I thought originally cost!!!! I will not order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Emig

customer_reviews.title: Not precision crafted though attractive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but would recommend not tightening fully the bolts for the legs until the footrails are torqued up. The wood supports that the legs are attached to are not robust and will snap during tightening. Inconsistencies of the threaded holes in the legs result in leg length discrepancies and rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Okella

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Got these stools to go in my small downtown condo for the bar table. They are well built and easy to assemble. Wish they had some thicker padding as it does wear down after a while. Other than that, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rinz

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy stools. Used them at a bar height table which matched nicely. Seems like these things are going to last forever. I now have them outside (in Phoenix) and they're still going strong over a year in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Solid Chair
customer_reviews.text: Words of advice. 1. Hand start all screws first. Don't force anything and don't tighten the screws until everything is assembled. 2. You will have to sand the bottom of some of the chair legs to get it to sit level. I ordered two to match the table and after putting them together I am ordering two more. Seems like a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Harrier

customer_reviews.title: They shipped promptly and arrived in pretty good shape
customer_reviews.text: We saw these in a local store but they only had one. They shipped promptly and arrived in pretty good shape. You will have to assemble these, but they are pretty easy to put together and the parts are good quality. As the instructions state, put all screws in just a turn or two before you tighten any. This is especially important with the circular foot rest. You will not be able to put this over the legs if the base screws on the legs are remotely tightened. First chair took 10 minutes to assemble, the rest took maybe 5 minutes each, and that was with my little guy "helping".
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: Two different leg colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these after assembling them realize one chair has white legs and the other one has brown. Not sure how to let company know there is a problem between the two. Update: excellent customer service they are replacing my chair ASAP. So changed my review to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sprout

customer_reviews.title: Love these bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Love these bar stools, the design is what I was looking for & looks good with my center island. They were easy to put together & seem to be well made. I gave 4 stars only because these seem to tip over very easily. We have a preschooler & a 22 month old who want to climb onto the bar stools and they tip back very easily. The old bar stools I had I did not like the style but they did not tip over like this. Trying to figure out what we can do to solve it, just be aware if you have small children.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sommer-Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality stools we love them. The only complaint I’d have is that they wreak of wood stain and my fingers have stain on them after putting together the stools. It’s like they were just finished the day before. But very comfortable and beautiful look.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These stools are more beautiful in person. Very happy with the comfort and ease of assembly. I have a high bar and I was hoping these would be high enough, but they aren't even at 36" high. I kept them because I like them so much and do not want to spend a lot of money for something that we likely won't use too often, but wanted to purchase stools to complete the look at the bar.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coulter

customer_reviews.title: THERE IS 1 STOOL NOT 2.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful stool. However, there’s only 1 of them. THERE ARE NOT 2 STOOLS. I was very disappointed to see that my box only had 1 stool in it when it came and one of the customers said that there were going to be 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Wenona Woolfolk

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments on these bar stools.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking chairs. I haven’t gotten lots of compliments on them. The only thing I did that seemed easier to me and might help someone else. Attach all of the legs to the circle and then attach the legs to the bottom of the seat. It made it easier to line up.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this myself pretty easy. First one took 45 minutes then each one a half hour. One of the backs of the chairs had a small black paint like mark on it. I used some white nail polish to cover it. Overall good value for the money. Seat cushion is a little hard but sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but NOT comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn because these look awesome in our house, I love the look and they're sturdy but the seat is HORRIBLY uncomfortable, they're hard as a rock. But they also look too perfect in our new house to care so three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our basement bar. Very easy to assemble. Seem to be pretty well made. Haven't sat in them for an extended period of time to comment on comfort, but for the time I have sat in them, I was comfortable. Just make sure to follow the directions and do not tighten anything until the instructions tell you to.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Richards

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice stool I think - it seems sturdy and it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice stool I think - it seems sturdy and it looks nice. The problem though, is the chair's backrest cannot be secured to the stool, because the screws do not line up at all with the metal backing. Believe me, I tried. I'm not sure if this defect is common to all stools they sell, or just a one out of ten quality control problem. Either way, buyer beware. I'm happy enough with using it as a backless stool, so I'm not going to return it, but if you actually want the backrest I'd advise looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these stools on prime day, so I got a really good deal. They took a little time to put together, but didn't require any special tools. I was able to assemble them by myself. The quality was great and gave my kitchen bar area a nice rustic look. The swivel feature is really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B.

customer_reviews.title: Loosing Tacks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, nice looking, but keeps loosing upholstery tacks after a month. Not only doesn't is look right with half of the tacks missing, it is also plain dangerous: we have to be careful not to step on them. Now, we have to decide what to do: to replace them all? What a nuisance!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy swivel chairs
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble alone. Sturdy, but tip over easy. My grandkids seem to tip them over easy. They look great, a little bulky so if you are looking for something light this is not it, they are heavy looking. Cheaper to purchase from Amazon than in Ashley store.
customer_reviews.author: SandyinSC

customer_reviews.title: It’s a 50-50 chance that your product will be damaged in one way or another
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 stools and they are obviously not cheap. Although they are pretty easy to assemble, they’re sturdy, and very heavy, 2 of them were scratched. Since the products are so heavy I didn’t bother to return them but it was very aggravating to spend over $270 on two stools that are scratched. So it’s up in the air if your product will be scratched or not which is why I gave the product an overall three
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Catania

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools look nice, but they are not sturdy. The screws on the back of the seat come loose almost daily. There are pins that hold the fabric to the seat cushion and they are falling out. I have had my kids step on them on the floor. So dangerous. I wish I could return these.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Acosta

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bar stool!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very sturdy and were easy to put together with a power drill. Love the fact that the foot rest is metal and will not scratch. The chairs swivel and are covered with heavy faux leather material that repels liquids and food easily. The seats are large enough for grown (and large) men. And perfect for a family with kids. Our island is large and we've purchased 8 of these. Couldn't be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: A swivel stool with a back, sign me up!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our bar to match our dining chairs. The height is perfect. Packing is a little lax, or maybe shredded styrofoam is just how they do it. Comes with all the tools you'll need to assemble, just have a vacuum handy for clean up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great Stools for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Rugged/Well built. Stands up to my grandkids and their constant abuse. My only beef is the pads could have been a little thicker for my boney butt. Otherwise, great stools.
customer_reviews.author: Zenman

customer_reviews.title: Love these barstools
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE that barstools. I have gotten so many compliments already. Easy to put together with one person for the first step (legs) but definitely need a second person for the foot rail part and barstool back. Very worth the money and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over tighten and take your time assembling! Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood! Came in great condition and looks perfect for the new bar..great rustic look but outstanding quality. Be careful when you tighten the bolts, you can crack the wood. I’m a big guy and always go too far at with tightening. Make sure you read the directions and don’t tighten each bolt in as you go, rotate around tightening each bolt a little at a time! Sturdy, big comfy seat. I’m almost 270 lbs and it’s perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: SPCT

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Pinnadel Swivel Bar Stool - Pub Height - Light Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Pinnadel Pub Height| Size:Pub HeightTThis pub height bar stool serves a sense of refinement without all the formality. A 180-degree spin element keeps you in the flow of conversation, while faux leather upholstered seating incorporates comfort and easy cleanup.
feature_bullets: PUB HEIGHT BAR STOOL: Pull up a seat by the kitchen counter. This barstool chair is comfy and stylish with versatile use, taking the spotlight in any dining area
SWIVEL BAR STOOL: With a 360-degree swivel, you have free range of motion to keep you in the flow of conversation. Made of wood, engineered wood and metal with a faux leather upholstered seat cushion
NAILHEAD TRIM: The light brown finish with wire-brushed effect and gray undertones is full of rustic appeal. Gray metal accents are a cool touch, and the antiqued nail-head trim ties it all together
GREAT BY A KITCHEN COUNTER: Bar stool measures 19.5” W x 19.5” D x 43.25” H;Comfortable footrest. Footrest height- 13 inches. Seat height- 30.25 inches
LIGHT ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions and hardware included. Screwdriver needed for assembly
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,291 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
